title: Won't load into game
body: Everytime i que up and get into a match we pick all the characters and bans and then when the game goes to load up everything looks normal. However after the screen disappears to the loading screen nothing comes up and then when i try to log out and "reconnect" it just does the same thing. Every time i would log out and hit reconnect it would never load i would be able to bring up the league tab and hit it over and over each time the screen would disappear but not connect. Ive gotten TWO leavers i would like to have my rank fixed and the loss' taken off, if you look at my history i do not have a tendency to leave games....EVER.

replies.body: Hi so i have still to get a reply, can someone from Riot at least acknowledge this and tell me where to go from there.....

TWO games of RANKED this happened in and all of a sudden too, i played a few games before hand which were fine then randomly it stops working and made me get TWO LOSSES AS AFK. I ask that those are removed and my points restored in ranked as these were unfair accusations made by RIOT systems

It sounds like you're having a connection problem and failing to establish comms to the game server.  You should go over each step of our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to get this fixed up, and to make sure your settings are configured to allow that access.  Keep in mind that game stats or LP is not something that can be adjusted, and you can continue to accrue [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) until your account shows consistent play without interruption.  Let me know if you have any questions!
